thread.title_full: Paducah, KY Weather Alert: 70° Christmas Day Possible Across Region - NewsBreak

author: County Herald Weather Center
title: Paducah, KY Weather Alert: 70° Christmas Day Possible Across Region - NewsBreak
text:
By County Herald Weather Center ,
12 hours ago Country Herald is Local News, Independent Pulse. Covering breaking local news, sports, lifestyle and events. Paducah, KY — Western Kentucky is heading toward an unusually warm Christmas week, with temperatures expected to climb into the upper 60s and low 70s, potentially making it one of the warmest Christmas periods residents have experienced in years. According to the National Weather Service in Paducah, temperatures will cool slightly on Sunday, December 21, […] This content first appeared on CountryHerald.com and is protected by copyright law.
